column3: “The Cough, or in this case Fort Collins Cough, is an excellent daytime strain for a relaxed and slightly euphoric buzz. Smoked a joint and went for an hour long walk of joy, lessened pain without the stoney effects of an indica.”

“Used to grow this strain years ago in Portland after it was brought up from Colorado.  What an amazing strain.  It's hazey flavor would stay in your mouth for a few solid minutes after a hit.  If you like haze and sativas then this is one of the best.  Growing it was a dream other then the fact it needed 70'day s at the minimum but the flavor and yields were worth it in the end.  To bad it's not around as much like t...”

“The Cough definitely lives up to its name (a true lung buster). Over all very good medication. I took 1 rip off my bong ( choaked my ass off) and got an instant head change. Two hits later all stress faded away and my chronic neck pain was gone... Wow, im imperssed, and that don't happen very often”
“This helped me alot with my back pain. i found myself day dreaming what seemed like hours but only ended being 3 mins. i would personally not recommend this if you have work to get done.”
“Very nice looking buds and a very strong high”
“Had the concentrate and it gave me an immediate buzz that was solid giving me a great balance of euphoria and focus.”
“very surprising”

“This Strain definitely lives up to its name. I would recommend it to anybody though, one rip off my bong and after I got coughing my ass off I was pretty high, three hits later all my pain, stress, and anxiety drifted away, i can honestly say i got stoned, definitely will buy this again”
“This helped me alot with my back pain. i found myself day dreaming what seemed like hours but only ended being 3 mins. i would personally not recommend this if you have work to get done.”
“Best sativa next to Durban poison. Very nice focused high with energetic qualities, it also tastes delicious”
“this will pick up up and get you going awsome for the morning”
“wonderful pick me up, lots of fun to smoke. smells wonderful. one of my favorite sativa”
“The Cough bud is one of top 5 strains of my personal favorites. its a very good sativa.”

“I love this strain!  After going to school in Fort Collins it was easy to take for granted but for some reason it is hard to find these days.  Living in denver now have finally tracked down a couple clones and look forward to having this available year round.  Top three strain for me.  Achieves a relaxed high that is just perfect whether you want to head outside or couch it.”

“I loved this strain!! Uplifting, energetic high that lasted a good amount of time in which I was able to get creative around the house!! Had a nice mellow come down where I was feeling nice and relaxed.”
“Perfect for a clear headed motivating high. One of the most dominant sativas hands down”
“The Holy Grail! Impossible to find, please help!”

“Nice dense nuggets, earthy smell. Daytime buzz, energetic and functional. 
Grown both indoors and outdoors, and excellent yield when done right!”
“loved it and if you grow it ,overbud this one a bit and you will make the most amazing weed ever!!!”
“Not sure if this is the proper strain page, but I picked up a strain from Pure dispensary just called Cough" that was labeled a hybrid...

column2: this strain hasn't given me either a sativa or indica high. Pretty much down the middle (hence it being labeled a hybrid
column3: I suppose). I'm primarily an indica smoker
column4: but wanted to start trying strains that wouldn't make me so sleepy when I wanted to smoke and go out with ...”"

column3: “I will just say this, it wasn't the strain for me. It made me cough uncontrollably, the high made me dizzy, kinda paranoid and a bit nauseous. I couldn't do anything but drank a bunch of water and try to get it out of my system as quick as possible”
“Good giggles. Funny sayings. I'm high right now.”
“This particular strain gave me a harsh cough but a fun little high with creative thoughts and thinking outside the box”
“No real cerebral or physical buzz”
